Job Title: Senior Consultant (ServiceNow GRC /  IRM),  - Risk Consulting
Job Description:
Roles & Responsibilities
We enhance performance through creating risk-enabled organizations. We help clients identify important risks, design frameworks to manage them and improve the effectiveness and efficiency of risk management. As a risk transformation professional, you will be addressing client issues such as business performance variability, business and process controls transformation; application security integrity, governance, risk and control (GRC) technology enablement, business and/or IT GRC, continuous monitoring, vendor and contract risk management and IT risk management. You will belong to an international network of specialists helping our clients transform risk functions and implement technology solutions that support risk management and governance.
We will support you with career-long training and coaching to develop your skills in risk strategy, risk function design, risk management and performance enhancement. As EY is a global leading service provider in this space, you will be working with the best of the best in a collaborative environment. So, whenever you join, however long you stay, the exceptional EY experience lasts a lifetime.
The opportunity
Applying your knowledge and experience to shape our services, you’ll focus on client opportunities where your expertise can make a substantial impact. You’ll apply your knowledge and experience to shape our services and motivate your team. You’ll build valuable relationships with clients and develop strong capabilities, through both formal training and working with senior mentors and talented colleagues.
Your key responsibilities
This is a role where no two days are the same – so you’ll find yourself taking on plenty of new responsibilities as you go. You’ll work alongside clients and colleagues, balancing your time between developing security strategies, advising stakeholders, providing workshops and supporting business development. If you’re flexible and ready to adapt to a constantly changing environment, there’s no better place to develop your skills. Since you’ll be working directly with clients, some travel will be required.
Skills and attributes for success
The role of a ServiceNow GRC Senior Consultant/Manager includes collaborating with other members of the engagement team to coordinate, plan and deliver ServiceNow GRC projects. As you build knowledge and experience, you’ll become a credible advisor to junior consultants to deliver work products across the focus areas mentioned above within the organization as well as the client contacts. Responsibilities include but are not limited to:
Implementing and delivering GRC technology enablement services using ServiceNow GRC/IRM platform – Policy and Compliance Management, Vendor Management, Risk Management, Audit Management, Business Continuity, and other risk management processes
Lead discussions and workshops with clients to create a risk-aware culture through proper technology enablement of risk-related processes using ServiceNow GRC/ IRM solutions.
Design and architect solutions to automated client processes into GRC solutions to meet their unique requirements
Assist with the business development activities (conduct demos/ POCs, scope/ efforts/ timeline estimation etc.) related to ServiceNow GRC/ IRM opportunities.
Effectively manage and motivate client engagement teams with diverse skills and backgrounds.
Consistently deliver quality client services and manage expectations of client service delivery.
Drive high-quality work products within expected timeframes and on budget.
Manager engagement budget, monitor progress, manage risk, and ensure key stakeholders are kept informed about progress and expected outcomes.
Demonstrate deep technical capabilities and professional knowledge.
Establish relationships with client personnel at appropriate levels
Demonstrate in-depth technical capabilities and professional knowledge, demonstrate ability to assimilate new knowledge
Remain current on new developments in GRC technology implementation services capabilities and industry knowledge.
To qualify for the role, you must have:
A recognized university degree in information technology, engineering, mathematics, accounting, business or other relevant disciplines.
At least 4 years of relevant consulting or industry experience, preferably in a professional services environment or MNC.
ServiceNow CIS certification in GRC/ IRM suite (Risk and Compliance, Vendor Risk Management etc.)
Experience in the design, architecture, configuration, and implementation of ServiceNow GRC/ IRM solutions.
Strong understanding of compliance and risk management processes.
Experience with agile methodology, creating process designs, technical designs, defining user stories, working with onshore/offshore development teams, leading user acceptance testing (UAT), and providing the necessary end-user training to deliver the proposed solution.
Experience in engaging and managing a variety of stakeholders with an ability to consult, provide recommendations, and develop solutions using GRC solutions.
Strong analytical, interpersonal, communication, writing and presentation skills.
Demonstrates integrity, values, principles, and work ethic.
Ideally, you’ll also have
Strong project management skills including agile methods.
Data analysis/ processing and visualisation skills using database, visualisation tools or spreadsheet application
Professional certifications such as Certified Information Systems Auditor (CISA), Certified in Risk and Information Systems Control (CRISC), Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP)
Experience with other GRC technology solutions (such as ServiceNow, MetricStream, IBM OpenPages etc.) will be an added advantage.
What we look for
We’re interested in flexible professionals with excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to prioritise shifting workloads in a rapidly changing industry. You’ll also need the confidence to give professional advice and guidance to colleagues and clients from a diverse range of cultures, often with limited information – both verbally and in writing. If you’re a fast learner, with strong influencing skills and a genuine passion for information system security, this role is for you.
What working at EY offers
We offer a competitive compensation package where you’ll be rewarded based on your performance and recognized for the value you bring to our business. We also offer you:
Support, coaching and feedback from some of the most engaging colleagues around
Opportunities to develop new skills and progress your career
The freedom and flexibility to handle your role in a way that’s right for you

Roles & Responsibilities
Job Description:
As a Project Manager at Inprodec, you will play a pivotal role in overseeing and managing commercial fitout projects from conception to completion. You will collaborate closely with clients, designers, suppliers, contractors, and internal project teams to ensure the successful execution of projects. Your exceptional project management skills will be essential in delivering projects on time, within budget, and upholding our commitment to quality.

Key Responsibilities:
1. Client Communication:
a. Act as the primary point of contact for clients and designers, providing expertise and supervision to ensure project objectives are met.
b. Facilitate regular communication and collaboration between all stakeholders throughout the project lifecycle.
2. Project Planning
a. Overall in-charge of assigned projects.
b. Collaborate with the project management team, design team, procurement team to develop detailed project plans, schedules, and budgets.
c. Coordinate and manage project activities, ensuring adherence to timelines and budget constraints.
d. Identify potential risks and develop mitigation strategies to minimize project disruptions.
e. Regularly update project stakeholders on progress and milestones.
3. Supplier and Contractor Coordination:
a. Verify and confirm quotations from suppliers and contractors, with particular focus on indent items.
b. Collaborate with procurement teams to ensure timely delivery of materials and services.
4. Change Management and Crisis Mitigation:
a. Assist in managing changes in project scope, identifying potential crises, and developing contingency plans to minimize disruptions.
b. Proactively address issues and challenges that may arise during project execution.
5. Compliance and Safety:
a. Assist in ensuring that all project plans and documents are submitted for approval to landlords and local authorities prior to the commencement of work.
b. Maintain a thorough understanding of relevant building codes and regulations.
c. Conduct site marking and inspections prior to the start of work, ensuring adherence to design and safety standards.
d. Oversee site activities to ensure project milestones are achieved.
6. Site Management
a. Foster a collaborative and motivated working environment to maximize productivity and quality.
b. Ensure communication with vendors, subcontractors for a project delivery
c. Implement quality control processes to ensure the highest standards of workmanship are maintained throughout the project.
7. Documentation:
a. Maintain comprehensive project documentation, including contracts, change orders, meeting minutes, and project correspondence, ensuring accuracy and accessibility for all stakeholders.
b. Generate regular reports on project status, including progress, issues, and solutions, to keep all parties informed and facilitate decision-making.
c. Monitor project budgets and financial performance, taking proactive measures to control costs and maximize profitability.

If you are a results-oriented professional with a passion for project management in the commercial fitout industry and are ready to take on challenging and rewarding projects, we invite you to apply for the position of Project Manager at Inprodec.

Requirements:
1. Diploma / Bachelor's degree in construction management, engineering, or a related field (preferred).
2. Proven experience as a Project Manager in the commercial fitout industry.
3. Strong knowledge of construction processes, materials, and regulations.
4. Excellent leadership and communication skills.
5. Proficiency in project management software and Microsoft Office Suite.
6. Problem-solving and crisis management abilities.
7. Commitment to quality, safety, and client satisfaction.
8. Able to work with building management, landlord, inhouse designers, client designers as well as internal procurement team.

Roles & Responsibilities
Key Responsibilities
• Provide exceptional levels of evidence-informed care and treatment to all patients with
injuries, disabilities and physical impairments increase their mobility, and be
independent in their physical activities
• Measure, record and retain pertinent client data and milestones in their physical therapy
journey with you
• Work hand in hand with our team of Personal Trainers and Therapists for your
clients, ensuring long term holistic engagement
• Engage in some business development activities which may include networking events,
delivering workshops, seminars and presentations to a varied group of stakeholders and
clients
• Demonstrate clinical leadership in your daily practice

Key Requirements
• Degree in Physiotherapy
• AHPC registered or eligible for registration
• At least 5 years of experience in Physiotherapy and allied fields
• Knowledge and experience of a wide range of musculoskeletal assessments and
treatment approaches for a wide range of clients with musculoskeletal conditions. Exposure to clients with rehabilitation and chronic condition management an advantage.
• Clear understanding of AHPC professional code of conduct and relevant professional
guidelines
• Exceptional service, result-oriented team player
• Excellent interpersonal and communication skills
• Organisation and time management skills

Company: GLOBAL INDIAN INTERNATIONAL SCHOOL PTE. LTD.
Job Description:
Roles & Responsibilities
JOB PURPOSE:
The role holder is responsible for delivering classroom instruction that helps students learn and excel and developing students’ abilities and interest through creative activities.
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:
Functional:

Plans the curriculum for the year for the respective grade
Develops the lesson plan in accordance with the curriculum guidelines, and presents the lesson plans to the academic coordinators for approval
Reviews the feedback from the academic coordinators and revises the lesson plans accordingly
Keeps up to date with the latest teaching aids, such as the use of technology in classroom learning, and integrate these into the teaching process
Creates challenging and engaging learning opportunities for students, and fosters a classroom atmosphere that is conducive for learning
Develops worksheets, handouts, and other learning materials in line with the lesson plan and curriculum, as well as the assessments and examinations
Responsible for the timely marking and correction of assignments completed by the students
Assess, records and reports on the development, progress and results of students
Identifies students who may require additional assistance, academic or non-academic, and ensures they receive the necessary support
Contributes to extra-curricular activities and participates in school activities such as assemblies, meetings and conferences
Ensures the safety of students at all times.
Interaction:

Collaborates with other teachers to share new ideas, teaching approaches, content and professional knowledge
Communications and provides feedback to the parents during the Parent Teacher Meetings, and whenever necessary.
Minimum Qualifications:

Graduate & Bachelor in Education (Specialisation in Subject for Middle teacher & senior teacher).
Experience:

3-5 years of Teaching experience.

Roles & Responsibilities
The Service Delivery Manager is responsible for managing all aspects of day-to-day Service Delivery Support. • The Service Delivery Manager will work closely with all operational areas of their assigned accounts/business • units, in particular with all Lines of Service. • Ensure Incident Management processes are followed effectively (ie SRT’s escalation and notification). • Process management and co-ordination for PIR’s and RCA’s for incidents affecting their respective customers, in conjunction with the Problem Management, ensuring the appropriate Business implement actions to prevent reoccurrences of the same issue. • Monitor and Manage Service delivery and Service Level Agreements ensuring that obligations are issues escalated and prioritized. • Coordinating Change Management activities as required. • Identify, implement and drive service improvements to increase customer satisfaction. • Forecast resource demand to ensure can plan and effectively deliver end-to-end services with minimum resource requirement. Interpret and plan projects and workload forecasts on an ongoing basis. • Service Delivery Manager is accountable for account service problems and prioritization of work requests for their monitoring specific customers. • Work with Business to integrate new, enhanced and existing service offerings for the account. • Take a positive leadership role in both and customer businesses by demonstrating core values. • The Service Delivery Manager may supply input to the customer Annual Technology Plan. • Assist with providing the customer IS team and LOS with relevant reporting and trend analysis statistics to pro-actively support and improve the customer business. • Work with Tower to analyse the client requirements and provide technical inputs (Server, Network and Database) for better Service delivery. • Understand Technical setup of the Client and provide technical inputs to manage existing with continuous improvement/enhancement required. • Work with Internal teams for delivering the services beyond BAU with additional revenue generated

Company: GLOBAL INDIAN INTERNATIONAL SCHOOL PTE. LTD.
Job Description:
Roles & Responsibilities
The Marketing Manager will be responsible for both brand management and digital marketing initiatives, ensuring a balanced focus on enhancing the school's visibility and engagement across multiple channels. This role requires a high level of creativity, attention to detail, and project management skills. Experience with CRM systems like HubSpot, high proficiency in analytics, sales support, social media management, and hands-on experience in running campaigns on Google and Facebook are essential. The role also involves managing and optimizing the marketing budget to ensure cost-effective campaigns. The ideal candidate will be a 360-degree marketing professional, knowledgeable in all facets of marketing.
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
Brand Management:
Develop and implement comprehensive branding strategies.
Ensure brand consistency across all marketing channels and materials.
Collaborate with internal and external teams to enhance brand visibility and engagement.
Identify and leverage opportunities to increase brand awareness.
Manage public relations efforts to maintain a positive brand image.
Oversee the creation and distribution of promotional materials.
Plan and execute brand events and sponsorships to enhance brand presence.
Develop Digital Marketing Strategies:
Design and oversee all aspects of our digital marketing department including our marketing database, email, and display advertising campaigns.
Develop and monitor campaign budgets.
Plan and manage social media platforms.
Prepare accurate reports on our marketing campaign’s overall performance.
Content Creation and Management:
Coordinate with advertising and media experts to improve marketing results.
Identify the latest trends and technologies affecting our industry.
Evaluate important metrics that affect our website traffic, service quotas, and target audience.
Work with your team to brainstorm new and innovative growth strategies.
SEO and SEM:
Plan, execute, and measure experiments and conversion tests.
Optimize user funnels.
Collaborate with internal teams to create landing pages and optimize the user experience.
Analytics and Reporting:
Utilize strong analytical ability to evaluate end-to-end customer experience across multiple channels and customer touch points.
Instrument conversion points and optimize user funnels.
Collaborate with agencies and other vendor partners.
High proficiency in analytics to track and report performance.
Sales Support:
Provide support to the sales team by generating leads through digital channels.
Assist in creating sales materials and presentations.
Campaign Management:
Hands-on experience in running campaigns on Google and Facebook.
Analyze and optimize campaign performance to achieve key metrics.
Numbers-oriented approach to evaluate and improve ROI.
Budget Management:
Develop and monitor marketing budgets.
Ensure cost-effective allocation of resources and optimize spending to achieve the best results.
CRM and CMS Management:
Experience with CRM systems like HubSpot is a plus.
Manage and optimize CMS platforms, preferably WordPress.
JOB REQUIREMENTS
Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Information Technology, or a related field.
Experience Required: 8 to 10 Years
Proven working experience in digital marketing, particularly within the industry.
Demonstrable experience leading and managing SEO/SEM, marketing database, email, social media, and/or display advertising campaigns.
Experience in optimizing landing pages and user funnels.
Solid knowledge of website analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics, NetInsight, Omniture, WebTrends).
Working knowledge of ad serving tools.
Experience in setting up and optimizing PPC campaigns on all major search engines.
Working knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript development and constraints.
Strong analytical skills and data-driven thinking.
Up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in online marketing and measurement.
Experience with CRM systems like HubSpot.
Proficiency in CMS platforms, especially WordPress.
Key Skills:
Strong verbal and written communication skills.
Comprehensive knowledge of all facets of marketing, including brand management and digital marketing.
Excellent organizational and time management skills.
Creative and innovative thinking.
Ability to work in a fast-paced, high-pressure environment.
Strong project management skills.
Numbers-oriented approach with a focus on metrics and ROI.
Ability to manage and optimize budgets effectively.
Working Days: 5.5 days per week
Location: Onsite
Benefits:
- 21 days Annual Leaves per year
- 5 days Emergency leaves per year
- Child Subsidy Scheme: Employee discount – tuition & transport fee for kids studying in GIIS or any of its entities (based on school policy)
- Transport Facility provided across Singapore

Are you a results-driven sales professional with a proven track record of success in building and managing profitable channel partnerships within the Enterprise Networking market?
Join a dynamic team and play a key role in driving the growth of our enterprise networking business. We are seeking a highly motivated and results-oriented Partner Sales Manager to develop and execute strategic channel programs, build strong relationships with key partners, and drive revenue growth
Responsibilities
Recruit, develop, and manage a high-performing network of channel partners (distributors, resellers, system integrators)
Provide comprehensive training, sales support, and marketing resources to empower channel partners
Collaborate with marketing to develop and execute joint go-to-market programs, including lead generation campaigns, events, and promotions
Build and maintain a robust sales pipeline, track key metrics, and forecast future sales performance
Ensure customer satisfaction by working closely with partners to deliver high-quality solutions and address customer needs
Stay informed about market trends, competitor activities, and emerging technologies in the enterprise networking space
Identify and pursue new business opportunities within the enterprise market through the channel
Requirements
Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field is preferred
5+ years of proven success in channel sales within the Enterprise Networking market (e.g., routers, switches, firewalls, data center networking)
Strong relationships with key distributors and resellers in the networking industry
Experience in developing and executing successful channel programs, including partner recruitment, enablement, and performance management
Proven track record of exceeding sales targets and achieving revenue growth through channel partnerships
Excellent communication, presentation, and negotiation skills

Job Description
To follow and understand works as per approved procedures, project specification and drawings for structural components for shop fabrication as per construction sequence and schedule.
To ensure compliance to HSE regulations and requirement.
To supervise the relevant sub-contractors to ensure the major output within the stipulated schedule without scarifying the HSE & Quality requirements.

To coordinate the subcontractor's supervisor regarding daily man power allocation and schedule the activities
To ensure all the workers follow our HSE policies and requirement.

To co-ordinate with EDD engineers / Clients for the shop /site related construction activities.

Company: FUJIFILM BUSINESS INNOVATION ASIA PACIFIC PTE. LTD.
Job Description:
Roles & Responsibilities
PURPOSE:
The Legal Counsel is to provide assigned business units with legal advice, to provide legal support to business activities and any strategic and operational matters and issues. This will include but not be limited to providing legal advice, legal support and contract review in respect of all contractual transactions (including but not limited to regional tenders, bids and all contract management related matters. The Legal Counsel shall be part of the Asia Pacific Legal Team and shall provide legal advice and support on any projects and tasks assigned by the General Counsel (General Manager Legal) or designated team leader / supervisor. These projects can include but shall not be limited to matters relating to: corporate secretariat, governance & compliance, disputes & litigation as well as investigation and intellectual property matters.
RESPONSIBILITIES & TASKS
To provide competent and sound legal advice to the Company, the FB Group and its Affiliates in a practical, efficient and timely manner.
To review/draft contracts pertaining to the business including but not limited to supplier contracts, customer contracts, inter-company contracts as well as regional tenders, bids, international sales/service transactions as well contracts with a global / multi-jurisdictional perspective.
To negotiate with external parties (including but not limited to suppliers and customers of the Company) on legal issues and work to resolve any legal related matters arising between the Company and such external parties, suppliers or customers.
To provide legal advice. legal support and work with the Company’s internal customers and stakeholders (internal functions) including but not limited to the sales/marketing department and all corporate support functions.
To coordinate and co-operate with all related organizations including FB Asia Pacific affiliates, FB Japan, FF Japan, FUJIFILM Holdings and the overall FUJIFILM Group to work on contracts, legal matters and any other matters so assigned by the General Counsel.
To raise and highlight all and any material legal issues to the supervisor / reporting manager / General Counsel and/or senior management whenever necessary.
To provide legal support, guidance and work with the Company’s affiliates and any member of the overall FUJIFILM Group whenever so instructed, assigned and/or tasked to do so by the General Counsel.
To take on any projects or tasks deemed appropriate and assigned by General Counsel. This may include but shall not be limited to projects relating to corporate secretarial matters, mergers and acquisitions, governance, compliance, regulatory, organizational structure, data privacy or any directly or indirectly legal related matters.
To succeed in this role, you will need to possess the following qualifications, skills and experiences:
2 to 3 years of working experience will be ideal
Degree in Law
Strong grasp of legal and commercial concepts
Strong language capability in English legal terminology (MUST) and Mandarin (Preferred)
Contract review/drafting skills
Legal negotiation skills
Clear and concise communication skills.
Commercial and business awareness.
Experience in having worked on complex commercial contracts and contracts on international sales / service transactions
Good grasp of timeliness and work process management
Willingness to learn and adapt to challenging and evolving work scenarios
Collaborative and harmonious spirit to work with others
Co-operative attitude and willingness to be a team player
Legal experience in working in multinational companies and contract management experience would be an asset
Broad communication skillsets and abilities to work with a variety of stakeholders. (For example: Both external and internal customers, APAC affiliates, Japan HQ, Tokyo and international affiliates for the purpose of coordination of contracts and other legal matters)
Ability to work under time pressure sensitive scenarios and to work on multiple matters, dealing with a number of internal customers concurrently
Ability to receive and take on guidance and direction and also work independently to helm various projects as and when required

Job Title: Manufacturing Technician (Fresh Grad welcome! AM / PM | East)
Job Description:
Roles & Responsibilities
This position requires the individual to performs electro-mechanical assembly operations, troubleshooting, repair & maintenance and testing of pneumatic systems/machine.
Duration: 12 months contract
Location: Upper Changi
Day Shift – 7.00am - 4.30pm
Noon Shift – 430pm to 130am ($25 Per Shift and one way transport home)
Job Duties:
Utilizes routine work orders, schematics, wiring diagrams, parts and wire lists, written and/or verbal instructions to build, repair and/or test electrical, electro-mechanical, vacuum, pneumatic assemblies, subassemblies and components.
Performs electro-mechanical assembly operations, troubleshooting and repair. Identifies and corrects errors.
Observes all safety standards. Maintains a secure, safe, clean and healthy work environment. Attends required health and safety training and follows safety and security policies, procedures and practices. Promptly reports accidents, injuries, safety hazards, or emergencies to supervisor or Safety dept. Follows operating instructions, uses protective equipment when required, and uses equipment and materials properly. Actively strives to prevent accidents and injuries.
Utilizes test fixtures, electronic measurement equipment, leak detectors, and/or vacuum pumps to test assemblies, subassemblies and components. Enters data on computer terminal, such as progress, work expense and labor details. May perform computer programming, repair or software installs.
Details finished work. Receives parts and performs audits to ensure all necessary parts are available to perform built, test and repair. Inspects parts for defects. Troubleshoots and improves processes and involved in test.

Company: GLOBAL INDIAN INTERNATIONAL SCHOOL PTE. LTD.
Job Description:
Roles & Responsibilities
JOB PURPOSE:
Founded in 2002, Global Schools Group is a Singapore-headquartered, community-oriented education institution whose mission is to cultivate and nurture young minds into global leaders of the future and is significantly contributing to achieving significant learning outcomes for every child. In the last two decades, the Foundation has grown to 64 campuses in 11 countries in ASEAN & South Asia, Middle East and India which provide world class education to over 45,000 students from 70+ nationalities. The schools offer various. curricula, including IB, Cambridge and CBSE.
As the GSG family of schools expands, we are looking for a University Guidance Counsellor, to join our team who would contribute to career counselling and university guidance efforts at the allocated school(s).
The primary responsibility is to provide university admissions guidance and support to students in their academic and career development. You will be responsible for the career counselling and university placements of the students at the allocated school(s). Your role also involves collaborating with faculty, parents, and community organizations to promote student success. This role is a critical part of the organizations strategy to develop our students into future ready graduates.
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:
Conduct Psychometric and Aptitude tests to to help students identify their strengths, interests, and career aspirations.
Schedule and conduct sessions / lectures by experts to enable career option exploration for grade 8-10.
Organize career cum university admissions fair for grade 11 -12 to connect them with university representatives of top global universities.
Drive one -to- one counselling from grade 8-10 to help students and their parents –
Interpret Psychometric and Aptitude tests outcome
Help them choose the right – fit career option and relevant subject stream(s)
Give activity recommendations to build their profile and demonstrate interests aligned with their career and stream choice
Drive one – to – one counselling from grade 11-12 to help students and their parents –
Select the right -fit course, college, country and exam for their undergraduate education
Create and execute a comprehensive plan for a successful application
Guide them to craft stellar essays / personal statements for their applications
Coordinate with stakeholders to ensure timely submission of transcripts, LORs and other relevant documents for university applications.
JOB REQUIREMENTS:
· Bachelor's degree with a min of 60% in aggregate marks. Master’s degree from an institution in UK, Canada, Aus. or the US is a big plus.
· Strong interpersonal and communication skills, with the ability to build relationships and engage with diverse students, parents, and community organizations.
· In depth knowledge of undergrad admissions to top universities across the globe.
· Excellent written communication skill pertaining to English language with thorough understanding of SOP / Essays / Personal Statement for university admissions.
· Ability to manage multiple tasks and prioritize work in a fast-paced environment.
At least 2 years of experience in admissions consulting / undergrad level for top universities / ivy league.
KEY INTERACTIONS:
Key Internal Contacts
Head – Career Counselling and University Placements
Zonal Lead – Career Counselling and University Placements
School Principal / Coordinators /Class Teachers
Students

Key External Contacts
University Representatives
Parents
Career Guidance Experts.

Job Description

Responsibilities

· Responsible for leading and directing estimating resources and proposing costing strategies through the review and analysis of completed projects as well as global and regional cost data to affect such strategies towards the realization of client’s business objectives.
· Responsible for ensuring that the Estimation & Analysis (E&A) Team personnel are in possession of correct skills, are given appropriate training, are up-to-date on the latest methods, procedures and requirements, and are sufficiently resourced to accomplish their tasks effectively
· Responsible for the effective review of tender specifications by E&A team and to ensure full understanding of project preambles and methods of measurement for purpose of generating accurate costing for tenders in line with project requirements.
· Responsible for leading the post-mortem analysis of costs based on data collected from completed projects and to conduct lessons learned on tenders which were not successful.
· Lead E&A team in vendor and customer techno-commercial clarifications and negotiations together with Procurement/Subcontracting teams and Marketing team, respectively.
· To develop, establish and implement effective business processes within the E&A team to ensure an acceptable degree of accuracy and credibility in the estimation of costs, for the company to remain competitive in pricing decisions by senior management.
· Refine and reconfigure estimating and analysis business processes that will ensure applicability at the project level.
· Ensure the setting up of a robust bid analysis system to evaluate cost estimates metrics by trades, categories, cost codes etc.
· Responsible for leading the implementation of cost estimating strategies for projects, including direct labor, materials, permanent equipment, construction equipment, project conceptual layout, outsourcing, etc.
· Responsible for ensuring the preparation and submission of accurate cost estimations, cost summaries and bid analysis by E&A team, and concise presentation in a timely fashion for submission to senior management.
· Responsible for the triangulation of cost estimates, actual past project costs, and proposed basis for costing strategy, for discussion and review with senior management.
· Responsible for the setup and preservation of database system for project cost estimates versus actual project costs by working with Marketing, Project Management, Production, Procurement, Sub-Contracting, Quantity Surveying, and Finance functions within the Company.
· Responsible for the review of project plans and specifications and ensure effective coordination between the E&A team and other departments to confirm complete scope.
· Responsible for identifying and evaluating all cost-related technical issues in projects.
· Responsible for ensuring the comprehensive review and completion of the bid forms and to ensure that they are within the given specifications.
· Responsible for ensuring the close monitoring of tender results and to ensure proper updating in the tender register.
· Responsible for conducting tender costing review with senior management and tender committee for approval.
· Responsible for the preparation and issuance of project budget for commercial handover to Project Managers and Production upon project award.

Job Requirements

· Bachelor’s Degree in any Technical discipline
· Minimum 10 years of commercial experience with roles in cost estimation and/or quantity surveying, preferably in the Singapore marine and offshore industry.
· Experience in the fabrication of Oil & Gas process modules, structures and skids preferred.
· Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
· Good written and verbal communication skills
· Proficient in Microsoft Excel is a must.
· Sound knowledge and skill in cost estimation.
· Possess good initiatives to ensure that tender submission deadlines are met.
· Organised, positive attitude and detail oriented.
· Team Player, resourceful with sense of responsibility.

ST Engineering is a global technology, defence, and engineering group with offices across Asia, Europe, the Middle East, and the U.S., serving customers in more than 100 countries. Job Summary:
The Marketing Admin provides administrative support by managing schedules, preparing promotional materials, tracking inventory for visual displays, and coordinating with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless execution of marketing initiatives. The ideal candidate is detail-oriented, proactive, and able to manage multiple tasks in a fast-paced environment. This role offers an excellent opportunity for someone looking to develop marketing skills while contributing to the success of exciting campaigns and brand growth.

Key Responsibilities:
Promotion Setup: Set up promotions within NetSuite, ensuring all details are correctly entered and functional for upcoming campaigns.
System Testing: Conduct tests in NetSuite for promotions to ensure everything is properly configured and ready for launch.
Ecommerce & Inventory Fullfillment : Coordination with production packing and scheduling driver for deliveries
Outlet Coordination: Liaise with outlets to confirm that all Visual Merchandising (VM) displays are up to standard and align with ongoing marketing campaigns.
Social Media Scheduling : Plan and coordinate with design team on the weekly social media posting
Administrative Support: Assist with general clerical duties such as preparing reports, handling correspondence, and scheduling meetings for the Marketing and Design teams.
Documentation & Filing: Maintain accurate records of marketing and design documents, ensuring easy access and up-to-date information.
Cross-functional Communication: Serve as a point of contact between the Design, Marketing, and Operations teams to ensure smooth execution of promotions and campaigns.

Prior experience in an administrative role, ideally in marketing or design environments.
Familiarity with NetSuite or similar ERP systems is a plus.
Strong organizational skills and attention to detail.
Good communication skills, both written and verbal.
Ability to multitask and handle deadlines efficiently.
Proficiency in MS Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint).

Job Description and Qualification:
This is a full time role for a Cashier (Liveshow) located in Bugis. Our client is Singapore's largest and first themed karaoke chain. This position is responsible for greeting customers, assisting with inquiries, and ensuring a positive experience. This includes addressing concerns, processing payments accurately, and ensuring correct pricing, quantities, and discounts. The role also involves providing receipts, maintaining knowledge of store products and promotions, and assisting with product recommendations. Cash register balance and transaction reconciliation are key duties, as well as following store procedures for cash handling and safeguarding against theft. The cashier will assist with restocking, organizing displays, and maintaining a clean checkout area while adhering to company policies and confidentiality standards.

Previous cashier or retail experience

Support firmware development using various DSP/MCU platforms.
As project key person to start from concept to mass production stage.
Implement design for manufacturing and design for automation. DFx.
Patent and technology creation, defining new power requirements.
Electrical and Firmware architectures (lead and support).
Key Requirements:
BSc, MSc, PhD, or researcher with Min. 8 years experience.
Experience with EV chargers and onboard chargers (OBC) is a plus.
Familiar with power measurement equipment.
With solid technical know-how on the transformer, power Mosfet, PWM controller, and synchronous rectifier circuits.
Understand the application of PID controllers and control loop analysis.
Knowledge of EMC/IEC/UL/EN standards.
Experience in PCB schematic and layout designs.

Job Title: Principal  /  Master Analog IC Design Engineer
Job Description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Key Responsibilities:
Development of Analog/Mixed-Signal circuits from specifications to prototypes.
System-level analysis and evaluation, full-chip architecture design, analysis, modeling, simulation, and integration.
Schematic entry, corner simulation, layout consideration, and post-layout simulation.
Work closely with the layout engineer to conduct the physical implementation (layout) and chip floor planning.
Responsible for post-layout extraction and parasitic analysis.
Able to work with other designers, Chip Architects, and layout engineers to achieve full-chip integration, place and route, top-level verification, and tape out.
Requirements:
Ph.D/Master/Degree in Electrical Engineering or Microelectronics with excellent technical background in Analog /Mixed-Signal IC design
Min. 8 years of experience in CMOS Analog IC design and simulation
Good design experience in Analog IC design involving two or more of the following blocks: low noise pre-amplifier (low offset, high CMRR, high PSRR and bandwidth up to 600MHz), CMOS Gigahertz Oscillator, switched capacitor circuit, LDO, Differential Amplifier, comparator, Opamp, TIA, and Bandgap Reference and high-frequency full-wave rectifier, etc.
Good design knowledge in ESD and Latch-Up.
Experience in isolator devices (capacitive-coupler or optical-coupler) and photodetector-associated circuits will be an added advantage.
Experience with sigma-delta modulators and IO drivers will be an added advantage.
Good working knowledge of relevant analog IC design and simulation tools (Spice or its equivalent)
Basic understanding and can develop simple design-related scripts with some common script languages, such as perl, Tcl, matlab or cadence skill etc.
A team player with good communication skills.
Able to work independently, flexibly, and creatively.

Job Objectives

Group Technology and Operations (GTO) provides software and system development, information technology support services and banking operations.

- Conduct technical delivery/process knowledge and best practices sharing/training sessions with internal teams to help improve overall delivery competency level.

Job Title: QA Tester (Banking / CBD / 1 Year Contract / Up to $4500)

Responsibilities:
1. Assist Product Owner to lead the Agile team and deliver the product road map required to support the business growth.

1. Candidate should possess at least bachelor’s degree in business management, IT, Science, Mathematics, Engineering or Digital Innovation.

Roles & Responsibilities
Responsibilities

1.Regulatory and Compliance Leadership:
· Serve as the primary point of contact for all regulatory and compliance matters related to Offshore Wind and Offshore Substation projects
· Develop and maintain a comprehensive understanding of international and local regulations, including environmental, local regulation such as BOEM, safety, and maritime regulations.
· Stay abreast of regulatory requirements, flag requirements, and industry best practices, developing and updating regulatory compliance plans,policies, and procedures.

2. Regulatory Review and Documentation:
· Conduct regulatory reviews of offshore substation designs and documentation to ensure compliance with relevant standards and regulations.
· Prepare and submit regulatory compliance documents, assist and collaborate with developer and/or client to provide input for permit applications, safety cases, and environmental impact assessments where require.
· Review and analyze reports from third-party consultants, providing critical feedback and recommendations.

3. Team Management and Development:
· Lead and mentor a team responsible for regulatory compliance and technical safety, setting objectives, monitoring performance, and providing career development guidance.
· Direct the team's progress in delivering regulatory requirements, plans,and reports, ensuring these are integrated into the design at an early stage.
· Manage the transformation of contractual specifications into cost-effective engineering solutions, following relevant codes, standards, and classification requirements.

4. Project Coordination and Support:
· Collaborate with other engineering disciplines (e.g., E&I, Piping,Mechanical) on problem areas related to regulatory compliance and technical safety.
· Provide regulatory compliance to commercial marketing, bidding, and procurement activities during pre-contract and contract development phases of Offshore wind and substation projects.
· Manage team coordination on design changes, ensuring follow-up on regulatory updates.

5. Interface and Liaison:
· Liaise with regulatory bodies, classification societies, third parties andother relevant authorities to obtain necessary approvals and certifications.
· Manage relationships with external consultants, regulatory specialists, and internal departments to ensure a holistic approach to compliance.

6. Strategy and Program Development:
· Develop and implement compliance strategies and programs to meet regulatory requirements and industry best practices.
· Initiate the development of compliance matrices to maximize team performance, accuracy, and design compliance.
· Contribute to the development of company policies and procedures related to regulatory compliance.

7. Risk Management and Auditing:
· Conduct internal audits to assess compliance with regulatory requirements and company policies specific to offshore wind and substation projects.
· Manage the development and maintenance of a recommendation register, ensuring that feedback from safety studies is integrated into project designs.

8. Reporting and Communication:
· Prepare regular reports on compliance status and regulatory risks for Project Engineering Manager.
· Review team reports for accuracy and liaise with customers, statutory, and classification authorities on design and compliance issues affecting production start-up.

9. Training and Development:
· Develop and deliver training programs to ensure staff awareness of regulatory requirements and compliance procedures.
· Provide career development guidance and routine administrative responsibilities, such as leave and course approvals.

Requirements
· Bachelor’s degree in electrical engineering, Marine Engineering, Environmental Science, or related field, an advanced degree is preferred.
· Minimum of 5-7 years of experience in regulatory affairs and compliance within the offshore industry.
· In-depth knowledge of international and local regulations applicable to offshore wind engineering and substation design.
· Strong understanding of risk assessment and management principles.
· Experience in preparing and submitting regulatory compliance documents and permit applications.
· Familiarity with technical aspects of offshore wind and Offshore substations, including high voltage systems, grid connection requirements, and marine engineering considerations.
· Proven experience in leading teams, mentoring, and guiding junior engineers.
· Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills.

Roles & Responsibilities
Responsibilities:
Design mould, tooling and test socket solutions based on customer specifications, semiconductor packages, and testing requirements.
Utilize CAD tools (such as CREO, AutoCAD, SolidWorks, or similar) to create detailed 3D models and technical drawings.
Ensure designs meet mechanical, thermal, and electrical performance requirements for high-precision semiconductor testing.
Select appropriate materials, tolerances, and manufacturing methods to ensure product durability, precision, and cost-effectiveness.
Able to carry out the R&D of new test socket whenever the market trend is needed.
Work closely with cross-functional teams, including Sales, Product Development, Process Engineering, and Manufacturing, to refine designs and ensure compatibility with testing equipment and processes.
Provide technical support to manufacturing teams during prototyping, production, and assembly to resolve any design-related issues.
Engage with customers and vendors to ensure all moulds, tooling and test socket solutions meet functional requirements and industry standards.
Oversee the prototyping phase, ensuring that initial designs are built and tested effectively.
Lead or participate in validation and testing efforts to ensure the tooling and test sockets perform under specified conditions (e.g., temperature, mechanical stress, electrical signals, thermodynamics).
Analyse test data and provide feedback for continuous improvement in design and materials.
Continuously seek to improve design efficiency and product performance, optimizing socket contact interfaces, reducing testing time, and improving signal integrity.
Innovate by introducing new design techniques, materials, or technologies that improve the quality, reliability, and cost of the test sockets and tooling solutions.
Stay up-to-date with the latest semiconductor technologies and testing methodologies to ensure cutting-edge designs.
Develop and maintain comprehensive documentation for all designs, including detailed engineering drawings, materials specifications, and manufacturing processes.
Create user manuals and technical documentation to guide customers and internal teams on the proper usage of tooling and test sockets.

Qualifications:
At least Bachelor’s degree in Mechanical Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or related field.
5+ years of experience in mould & tooling design AND test socket design within the semiconductor industry or a related field.
Proven experience in designing test sockets, jigs, fixtures, and other related components for semiconductor testing.
Proficiency in & Hands-on experience with CAD software for mechanical design and simulation (e.g., CREO, SolidWorks, or AutoCAD).
Understanding of semiconductor testing processes and requirements (ATE – Automated Test Equipment).
Strong mechanical design and analytical skills.
Knowledge of materials science, particularly in relation to thermal management, wear resistance, and conductivity in socket designs.
Familiarity with signal integrity, high-speed test interfaces, and electrical characteristics relevant to test socket performance.
Excellent problem-solving skills, with the ability to identify and address complex technical challenges.
Strong attention to detail and precision in design and documentation.
Ability to work independently and as part of a cross-functional team.
Familiarity with industry standards for semiconductor testing (JEDEC, EIA, etc.).
Effective communication skills for both internal team coordination and customer interactions.
Willingness to travel occasionally for customer visits, manufacturing site inspections, or vendor meetings.

Roles & Responsibilities
JOB SCOPE
Be responsible for the food production following the flow from when it gets delivered to the guest plate; be in control of the step by step preparation.
Work closely with receiving and purchasing on a day to day operation controlling raw material quality standard.
Ensure quality of food items according to the standards in place. It includes ensuring all food items are in perfect sanitary condition, applying “First in First out!” kitchen best practice.
Monitor the production of food items to ensure they are in compliance with the prescribed recipes and specifications. Adhere to all the standards of food presentation, production, and portioning controls.
Be hand on in the timely pre-preparation before rush hours as well as for the next day “Mise en Place “requirement.
Complies and ensures hygiene policies are strictly adhered to a daily basis being relentless checking and controlling cooks applying all standards in place.
Uncompromising level of commitment and support to the hygiene manager and executive chef in order to achieve the highest level of food safety requirement in all kitchens.
Maintain a high standard of cleanliness and sanitation in and around all pastry work areas and ensure that all colleagues clean their stations after every service. Be responsible ensuring that daily and weekly cleaning are strictly followed.
Ensure safe and proper use of equipment at all times and to instruct this to all pastry colleagues.
Report to pastry management any maintenance defects using the correct and proper procedures.
Provide accurate recipes with appropriate training to the line cooks enabling them to deliver consistent food product. Assist individuals with their job functions and on the job training when necessary to ensure optimum service to customers.
Estimates food consumption to schedule purchases and requisition of raw materials. Minimize waste and spoilage to expenses in line with budget.
Prepare efficient daily work list and train line cooks to produce mise en place with sense of priority and time management.
Assist Chef de Cuisine providing all team members with a daily briefing to inform them of particular items, changes in procedures, new operating policies or information deemed to be of general interest.
Attend all Sous chef meetings and pass on information to pastry colleagues.
Ensures a cooperative and professional rapport is maintained with all external controls. Fosters and promotes a cooperative working climate, maximizing productivity and employee morale.
Co-ordinate with main kitchen, culinary and butchery to ensure that there is sufficient supply of high quality mise en place for next shift.
Be willing to undertake additional duties and responsibilities of work outside the normal daily/weekly routine but within the overall scope of the position.
Constantly provide feedback to the employees on their job performance creating a work environment which valued trust and transparence.
Help maintaining high productivity levels through efficient monitoring of duty roster which are relevant to business needs. Organize and plan annual leave in the same manner.
Maintain high standards of grooming for oneself and subordinates ensuring good customer relations are maintained at all times, in particular when working in the public areas of the hotel.
Able to demonstrate a positive attitude and take pride in one’s work. This must be reflected in the product produced for our guests to consume.
Ensure that you report to work on time as per pastry department schedules. Report any sickness or absence from work using the correct procedures.

Culinary Diploma or Certificate.

Must have strong culinary experience (international preferred) proven organizational skills.
Excellent in leadership & supervisory skills with a “hands-on” approach
Excellent logistical, culinary and leadership skills.
Fluent in English, knowledge of additional languages is advantages.
Able to instill safety and sanitation habits.
Willing and able to work shift work.
Have a well-groomed, professional appearance.
People & customer oriented, motivator & self-starter.
Team builder, displays initiative & creativity.

Description & Requirements

Job Summary:
We are looking for a highly skilled High Voltage/Medium Voltage Engineer to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for the design, development, maintenance, and troubleshooting of high voltage and medium voltage systems in offshore substations. This role requires extensive knowledge of electrical engineering principles, offshore operations, and safety regulations.

Responsibilities:
Design and Development: Collaborate with the system supplier to design and develop HV/MV systems and equipment (Electrical, Protection & SCADA) for offshore substations.
System Analysis: Familiar with Electrical calculations and system analysis to determine specifications and ensure optimal performance to meet client requirements.
Compliance: Ensure all HV/MV systems comply with relevant safety standards and regulations.
Inspection and Testing: Perform regular inspections, conduct factory testing and support in field commissioning to assess the technical compliance and performance of HV/MV equipment.
Troubleshooting and Technical Support: Diagnose and provide technical support in resolving technical issues on HV/MV systems and guidance to junior engineers and technicians.
Collaboration: Work closely with other engineers, technicians, vendors and regulatory bodies and clients to address and solve problems related to HV/MV systems.
Documentation: Prepare detailed reports, system architecture diagrams, purchase specifications, functional description and control philosophy to document system designs, construction, modifications, and maintenance activities.
Preventative Maintenance: Collaborate with the system supplier to develop and implement preventative maintenance procedures for HV/MV systems to ensure safety and performance.
Requirements:
Education: Minimum bachelor’s degree in electrical engineering or related field.
Experience: At least 3 ~ 5 years of relevant experience in high voltage or medium voltage engineering, preferably in an offshore environment.
Skills: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, excellent communication and teamwork abilities, proficiency in using electrical design software.
Certifications: Relevant certifications in high voltage or medium voltage engineering are a plus.
Knowledge: In-depth knowledge of electrical engineering principles, high voltage systems, offshore operations, and safety regulations.
Innovation: Ability to stay up to date with the latest advancements and best practices in HV/MV engineering.
Leadership: Capability to lead and mentor junior engineers and commitment to safety.
Adaptability: Ability to work as a team in challenging offshore environment and possess good planning, organizational, interpersonal skills with adaption to ever-changing

Roles & Responsibilities
JDE Applications Support Engineer

Overview of the client

Our client’s principal activities are to provide Clients with Full Turkey Project Management. This includes engineering, project management through the pre-construction planning, critical path development, construction / fabrication / site management, commissioning and hand over. It has executed a wide range of major projects involving Marine FPSO Conversion/Process Module Construction related to Oil and Gas Industry, Sub-Sea Products, Semi-Submersibles, Repair of Oil Rigs, Pharmaceutical Process Packages and Power Generation Facilities since its foundation in 1990. This vast experience and Total Commitment to Customer Satisfaction has since earned it a strong reputation in the industry as a reliable local business partner that aspire to exceed our clients’ expectations.

It is looking for a JDE Applications Support Engineer.

Role

This Support Engineer will have to provide technical support and assistance to end-users utilizing JDE. He/ she will be responsible for troubleshooting and resolving technical issues with JDE. Moreover, he/she needs to comprehend JDE modules, functionalities, and configurations.

Job Highlights

- Competitive compensation benefits
- Good career advancement opportunities
- Permanent role| 5 days’ work week

Job Description

Job Responsibilities

· Provide technical support for JD Edwards EnterpriseOne applications, troubleshooting issues and ensuring system availability and performance.
· Collaborate with cross-functional teams to analyze, configure, and implement system enhancements and upgrades.
· Conduct regular system maintenance, including patching, updates, and monitoring system health.
· Offer end-user training and create documentation to facilitate efficient use of JDE applications.
· Respond promptly to user queries, identifying root causes and implementing solutions in a timely manner.
· Participate in the development and execution of test plans for system changes and enhancements.
· Maintain compliance with security standards, ensuring data integrity and confidentiality within the JDE environment.
· Proactively identify opportunities to streamline processes and optimize system performance.

Job Requirements

· BSc Computer science or similar
· At least 3 years of working experience in providing applications/system support for JD Edwards
· 3-5 years of supporting level working experience and very familiar with Finance, Logistics and Warehouse and Procurement Module in JDE
· JD Edwards EnterpriseOne Cloud certification will be an added advantage
· You should also have an understanding of business concepts and strong analytical and problem-solving skills
· The role needs someone who knows finance, procurement and engineering modules for JDE
· Adaptable to fast paced work environment
· Able to work under pressure and finish assigned work on time
· Strong oral and written communication skills are essential.

Job related information

- Permanent - 5 days’ work week| Monday-Friday 8am-5:30 pm
